issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Description

When building from Studio or the CLI the following header is printed out

{code}
Titanium Command-Line Interface, CLI version 3.4.2-alpha, Titanium SDK version 3.5.1.v20150223154830
Copyright (c) 2012-2014, Appcelerator, Inc.  All Rights Reserved.
{code}

The copyright date should be updated to 2015
h5.Steps To Reproduce

1. Build a project from Studio or the CLI

h5.Actual Result

The copyright shows 2014

h5.Expected Result

The copyright should show 2015
fields.summary: CLI: Copyright date is not correct, it should be 2015 not 2014
fields.environment:
Mac OSX 10.10.2
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.4.2.201502181619
Titanium SDK build: 3.5.1.v20150223154830
Titanium CLI, build: 3.4.2-alpha
Alloy: 1.5.1

comments.body:
Verified fix on: 

Mac OSX 10.10.2
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.4.2.201502181619
Titanium SDK build: 3.5.1.v20150226105118
Titanium CLI, build: 3.4.2-rc
Alloy: 1.5.1

Using the above, ran ti build -h and the copyright date now shows as 2015.

Closing ticket.
